content.html: That’s a good point and not something I’d really considered as security guards over here are like glorified doorstops with no real power. I’d not made the connection they’re a stand in for the cops because of that and it certainly adds another layer I’d not thought of.
content.value:
That’s a good point and not something I’d really considered as security guards over here are like glorified doorstops with no real power. 

I’d not made the connection they’re a stand in for the cops because of that and it certainly adds another layer I’d not thought of.
